pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers
Class Database_ReadEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers.Database_ReadEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler
public class Database_ReadEventHandler
extends Object
implements EventHandler

The Database_ReadEventHandler handles all database events that require reading from the database

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(Event<?> event)
This function is called when any of the events that this class registered for is dispatched, and proceeds to handle them. It determines what the called event is, then calls the appropiate internal event handling function

Specified by:
handleEvent in interface EventHandler
Parameters:
event - The event to be handled by the object
